name: Blackberry
description: The sweet, dark, fruity, floral, slightly sour, somewhat woody aromatic associated with blackberries.
preparation: Serve jam in a 1-ounce cup. Cover with a plastic lid.

name: Berry
description: Sweet, sour, floral aromatic associated with berries.
preparation: Place 1 teaspoon in a 1-ounce cup. Cover with a plastic lid.

name: Strawberry
description: Sweet, slightly sour, floral, fruity aromatic associated with strawberry.
preparation: Thaw strawberries. Serve at room temperature in cup.

name: Orange
description: Citric, sweet, floral, slightly sour aromatic associated with oranges.
reference: Tropicana Pure Premium Original 100% No Pulp
preparation: Serve juice in a 1-ounce cup. Cover with a plastic lid.

name: Coconut
description: Slightly sweet, nutty, somewhat woody aromatic.
preparation: Place 1 drop of coconut extract on a cotton ball in a snifter.

name: Olive Oil
description: Light, oily aromatic which may have buttery, green, peppery, bitter notes.
preparation: Put 1 tablespoon in a medium snifter. Cover.

name: Peapod
description: Green aromatic that is sweet, beany, fresh, raw, and musty/earthy.
reference: Le Nez du Café no. 3 'Garden Peas'
preparation: Place 1 drop of essence on a cotton ball in a large snifter.

name: Peanuts
description: Sweet, light brown, oily, somewhat musty/dusty aromatic.
preparation: Roast at 425°F for 10 mins. Chop and serve.

name: Hazelnut
description: Woody, brown, sweet, musty/earthy, slightly cedar aromatic.
preparation: 1/4 teaspoon extract in 1 cup of whole milk.

name: Almond
description: Sweet, light brown, woody, and buttery aromatic.
reference: Le Nez du Café no. 27 'Roasted Almonds'
preparation: Place 1 drop of essence on a cotton ball.

name: Honey
description: Sweet, light brown, slightly spicy aromatic.
preparation: Dissolve 1 tbsp honey in 250ml hot water.

name: Vanilla
description: Woody, slightly chemical aromatic associated with vanilla bean.
preparation: Stir 1/8 tsp extract into 1/2 cup whole milk.

name: Molasses
description: Dark, caramelized top notes; slightly sharp/acrid.
preparation: Mix 2 tsp molasses in 250ml water.

name: Jasmine
description: Intense, slightly pungent, sweet, floral aromatic.
preparation: Place 1 drop of extract on a cotton ball in a snifter.

name: Rose
description: Sweet, soft, slightly musty/dusty floral fragrance.
preparation: Place 2 drops of rose water on a cotton ball.

name: Pepper
description: Spicy, pungent, musty, woody aromatic.
preparation: Place 1/2 teaspoon pepper in a medium snifter.

name: Tobacco
description: Brown, slightly sweet, slightly pungent aromatic.
preparation: Break cigarette and place 0.1g tobacco in snifter.

name: Ashy
description: Dry, dusty, dirty, smoky aromatic associated with burnt residue.
preparation: Burn white paper, place ashes in jar.

name: Rubber
description: Dark, heavy, slightly sharp, pungent aromatic.
preparation: Place 10g of rubber bands in a snifter.

name: Skunky
description: Aromatics associated with skunks.
preparation: Place 2 balloons in a glass jar.
